janadhipathi wruththiya samithi katayuthu pilibanda adhyakshaka janaral bharatha lakshman pe්ramachandra mahatha athuluwa pudgalayan siwudeneku ghathanaya kirime siddhiyata adalawa pawathi handuna ganime perettuwedi bharatha lakshman mahathage riyaduru athulu sesu sakkikaruwan wisin sakakaruwan dasa deneku handunaganu labiya.kolambaa athireka mahesthrath prasanna da alwis mahatha hamuwe eeye (03) pawathwunu mema perattuwata randawum niyoga matha randawa rakshitha barayata pathkara siti sakakaruwan dasa deneku idiripath kara thibina.pudgalayan 70 deneku yodagena sakakaruwan dasa dena handuna ganime perattuwa kolambaa athireka mahesthrath prasanna da alwis mahatha hamuwe pawathwini.adiyara dekakin mema perattuwa pawathwu athara ek adiyarakata sakakaruwan pas dena bagin yoda ganini.mema handunaganime perettuwa sandaha chandana jagathkumara, chaminda jayanath, lanka rasanjana, malaka samira, widana gamage amila, sarath bandara, suranga pe්ramalal, chaminda saman kumara, rohana marasinha saha en. si. shaminda yana sakakaruwan dasa dena rahas polisiya wisin idiripath kara thibina.siddhiya sambandhayen pawath wu handunaganime perattuwe sakkikaruwan washayen bharatha lakshman mahathage riyaduru saman shantha perera, siddhiya asin dutu sakkikaruwan lesa marl pransis wijesinha, sanjiwa prasad, indrapala piris yana aya idiripathwa sitiyaha.mita amatharawa bharatha lakshman mahathage golayaku wana chanaka pathiranga amaradewa kollupitiya polisiye polis kosthapal ashoka botheju, polis sarayan ajith priyantha, parlimenthu manthri duminda silwa mahathage aarakshaka anshaye polis sarayan lakshman priyantha disanayaka, polis sarayan mirihana polisiye hemantha kumara yana aya athuluwa sakkikaruwan nawadeneku rahas polisiya wisin handunaganime perattuwa sandaha namkara thibina.bharatha lakshman pe්ramachandra mahatha athuluwa hatharadenaku ghathanaya kirima polis sarayan gaminita wedi thaba thuwala sidukirima ha parlimenthu manthri duminda silwa mahathata wedi thaba ghathanayata thath kirima yana siddhin deka pilibanda wena wenama parikshana pawathwimata nithipathi upades illa thibuna da methek ee sandaha upades labi nathi bawata rahas polisiya adhikaranayata danwiya.thawada thuwala laba widesha prathikara labana parlimenthu manthri duminda silwa mahatha athadanguwata ganima sandahada nithipathiwarayage upades labaganimata apekshakara athi bawath ee sandahada methek upades labi nathi bawata rahas polisiya adhikaranaya hamuwe pawasiya.aparadha sthanaye thibi soyagath unda deka milimitar 75 wargaye 148199 darana pistholaye nikuth wu bawata rajaye rasa parikshanawalin heli athayi polisiya pawasiya.ema unda polis sarayan aar.
